title: Kids spend the summer in STEM camp
itunes:title: Kids spend the summer in STEM camp
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: Summer vacation season is here, and between days at the pool and family trips, some kids are staying busy programming robots. STEM summer camps are an increasingly popular way to keep young brains active when children are out of school, and maybe cultivate the next generation of tech leaders. WBEZ’s Susie An visits a Code Ninjas camp in Illinois to share more about the program.
